func.title: GetCommand

param.name: element
param.desc: Data to be returned. Unspecified or 0: Name, 1: Target, 2: TargetX, 3: TargetY, 4: Target2, 5: Data

param.name: command_num
param.desc: Number of the command. 0 is the currently active command, other values are the following (super-level) commands.

func.desc: Returns information on a current command of an object. If the object does not have any commands set, nil is returned for all queries.

example.text: If the object has been commanded to enter the home base, this script will warp the object there directly.
